name: Monkey D. Luffy
description: The captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and the son of the Revolutionary Dragon. He ate the Gum-Gum Fruit, becoming a rubber man. His dream is to find the One Piece and become the King of the Pirates.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

fruit.name: Gum-Gum Fruit
fruit.description: Grants rubber-like properties to the user's body.

name: Roronoa Zoro
description: A master swordsman and the first member to join the Straw Hat Pirates. He practices the Three Sword Style (Santoryu) and aims to defeat Dracule Mihawk to become the World's Greatest Swordsman.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Nami
description: The navigator of the Straw Hat Pirates and a former thief specializing in robbing pirates. She is an expert in meteorology and cartography, dreaming of drawing a map of the entire world.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Usopp
description: The sniper of the Straw Hat Pirates and a talented liar. Son of Yasopp, he dreams of becoming a 'Brave Warrior of the Sea' like the giants of Elbaf.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Vinsmoke Sanji
description: The cook of the Straw Hat Pirates and a former prince of the Germa Kingdom. A master of the Black Leg style who refuses to use his hands in combat. His dream is to find the All Blue.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Tony Tony Chopper
description: The doctor of the Straw Hat Pirates. He is a reindeer that ate the Human-Human Fruit, giving him human intelligence and transformation abilities. He dreams of becoming a doctor who can cure any disease.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

fruit.name: Human-Human Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to transform into a human hybrid or a full human at will.

name: Nico Robin
description: The archaeologist of the Straw Hat Pirates and the sole survivor of Ohara. She is the only person alive who can read Poneglyphs, making her key to finding the One Piece.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

fruit.name: Flower-Flower Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to sprout pieces of their body from the surface of any object or living thing.

name: Franky
description: The shipwright of the Straw Hat Pirates and a cyborg. He built the Thousand Sunny and dreams of creating a ship capable of circumnavigating the world.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Brook
description: The musician of the Straw Hat Pirates. He is a living skeleton who returned to life thanks to the Revive-Revive Fruit. He wishes to reunite with the whale Laboon.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

fruit.name: Revive-Revive Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to bring their soul back to their body after death, and manipulate their soul.

name: Jinbe
description: The helmsman of the Straw Hat Pirates and a former Warlord of the Sea. A master of Fish-Man Karate, he dreams of true equality between humans and Fish-Men.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Zeus
description: A thundercloud homie originally created by Big Mom using her own soul. He is now Nami's loyal partner and resides within her Clima-Tact.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Cavendish
description: The captain of the Beautiful Pirates and the 1st ship captain of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He suffers from a split personality disorder, becoming the bloodthirsty Hakuba when he sleeps.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Suleiman
description: A former war criminal known as 'Suleiman the Beheader'. He joined the Beautiful Pirates and is a member of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Bartolomeo
description: Captain of the Barto Club and the 2nd ship captain of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is a massive fan of the Straw Hat Pirates and uses the Barrier-Barrier Fruit.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

fruit.name: Barrier-Barrier Fruit
fruit.description: Enables its user to generate almost invisible barriers to deflect or block any attack.

name: Gambia
description: A staff officer of the Barto Club known as 'The Missionary'. He fights using a nunchaku.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Sai
description: The 13th leader of the Happo Navy and the 3rd ship captain of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He uses the Hasshoken martial art style.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Boo
description: The vice-leader of the Happo Navy and Sai's brother. He fights using axes imbued with Hasshoken.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Baby 5
description: A former assassin for the Donquixote Family who married Sai. She ate the Arms-Arms Fruit and can transform her body into any weapon.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

fruit.name: Arms-Arms Fruit
fruit.description: Enables the user to transform body parts into weapons of all kinds (revolver, cannon, saber, missile).

name: Ideo
description: A martial artist from the Longarm Tribe and captain of the Ideo Pirates (4th ship of the Grand Fleet). Known as 'The Destruction Cannon'.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Blue Gilly
description: A martial artist from the Longleg Tribe who joined the Ideo Pirates. He specializes in the Jao Kun Do fighting style.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Abdullah
description: A former bounty hunter who joined the Ideo Pirates. He fights using spears and dirty tactics alongside his partner Jeet.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Jeet
description: A former bounty hunter who joined the Ideo Pirates. He fights using dual swords alongside his partner Abdullah.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Leo
description: A dwarf from the Tontatta Kingdom and captain of the Tontatta Pirates (5th ship of the Grand Fleet). He uses the Stitch-Stitch Fruit.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

fruit.name: Stitch-Stitch Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to sew and unstitch anything on flat surfaces.

name: Kabu
description: A dwarf of the Tontatta Tribe and the Yellow Kabu Squad Leader. He ate a Zoan fruit that turns him into a Rhinoceros Beetle.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

fruit.name: Bug-Bug Fruit, Model: Rhinoceros Beetle
fruit.description: Whoever eats it can transform into a rhinoceros beetle. It enables the user to fly.
fruit.roman_name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Kabutomushi

name: Bian
description: A dwarf of the Tontatta Tribe and the Pink Bee Squad Leader. She ate a Zoan fruit that turns her into a Hornet.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

fruit.name: Bug-Bug Fruit, Model: Hornet
fruit.description: Whoever eats it can turn into a wasp/hornet. It enables the user to fly.
fruit.roman_name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Suzumebachi

name: Hajrudin
description: A giant warrior from Elbaf and captain of the New Giant Warrior Pirates (6th ship of the Grand Fleet). He dreams of reviving the glory of the Giant Warrior Pirates.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Stansen
description: A giant from Elbaf and the shipwright of the New Giant Warrior Pirates. He was formerly imprisoned at the Human Auction House.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Road
description: A giant from Elbaf and the navigator of the New Giant Warrior Pirates. He is usually seen with a large snake.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Goldberg
description: A giant from Elbaf and the cook of the New Giant Warrior Pirates. He carries a large shield and mace.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Gerd
description: A female giant from Elbaf and the doctor of the New Giant Warrior Pirates. She wields a massive battle axe.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Orlumbus
description: An admiral commanding the Yonta Maria Grand Fleet and the 7th ship captain of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is known for his strict discipline.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Buggy the Clown
description: One of the Four Emperors and leader of the Cross Guild. He was an apprentice on Roger's ship alongside Shanks and is famous for his incredible luck.

crew.name: Buggy's Delivery
crew.description: A pirate mercenary organization led by Buggy the Clown, formerly one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea.

fruit.name: Chop-Chop Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to separate their body into several parts and levitate them independently.

name: Alvida
description: Known as 'Iron Mace' Alvida, she is a pirate captain allied with Buggy. After eating the Slip-Slip Fruit, she became incredibly beautiful and slippery.

crew.name: Buggy's Delivery
crew.description: A pirate mercenary organization led by Buggy the Clown.

fruit.name: Slip-Slip Fruit
fruit.description: Smoothes the user's skin, making it slippery and deflecting objects that touch the body.

name: Galdino (Mr. 3)
description: A former Baroque Works officer who joined Buggy. He is a tactician who can create objects out of wax.

crew.name: Buggy's Delivery
crew.description: A pirate mercenary organization led by Buggy the Clown.

fruit.name: Wax-Wax Fruit
fruit.description: Produces a fast-hardening wax that can be molded into any shape.

name: Mohji
description: The first mate of the Buggy Pirates and a beast tamer. He is rarely seen without his giant pet lion, Richie.

crew.name: Buggy's Delivery
crew.description: A pirate mercenary organization led by Buggy the Clown.

name: Cabaji
description: The chief of staff of the Buggy Pirates. He is an acrobat swordsman who uses unicycles and spinning tops in combat.

crew.name: Buggy's Delivery
crew.description: A pirate mercenary organization led by Buggy the Clown.

name: Kuro
description: The captain of the Black Cat Pirates, known for his high intellect and speed. He uses 'Cat Claws' as weapons and faked his death to live peacefully.

crew.name: Black Cat Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew from East Blue formerly led by Captain Kuro, known for their schemes and cat-themed aesthetic.

name: Sham
description: One of the Nyaban Brothers of the Black Cat Pirates. He fights cooperatively with Buchi and pretends to be weak to lower opponents' guard.

crew.name: Black Cat Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew from East Blue formerly led by Captain Kuro.

name: Buchi
description: One of the Nyaban Brothers of the Black Cat Pirates. He is the stronger and larger of the duo, using his weight to crush enemies.

crew.name: Black Cat Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew from East Blue formerly led by Captain Kuro.

name: Don Krieg
description: The Admiral of the Krieg Pirates and the most feared pirate in East Blue before entering the Grand Line. He relies on massive weaponry and armor.

crew.name: Krieg Pirates
crew.description: An enormous pirate armada from East Blue led by Don Krieg, known for their military might and trickery.

name: Gin
description: The Combat Commander of the Krieg Pirates and Don Krieg's right-hand man. He fights using tonfas and has a strong sense of loyalty.

crew.name: Krieg Pirates
crew.description: An enormous pirate armada from East Blue led by Don Krieg.

name: Pearl
description: A commander of the Krieg Pirates known as 'Iron Wall Pearl'. He wears large shields on his body and can ignite them with fire.

crew.name: Krieg Pirates
crew.description: An enormous pirate armada from East Blue led by Don Krieg.

name: Mont Blanc Cricket
description: A descendant of Mont Blanc Noland living on Jaya. He spent years diving for the City of Gold to clear his ancestor's name.

crew.name: Saruyama Alliance
crew.description: An alliance formed to search for the Sky Island and the City of Gold.

name: Masira
description: The Salvage King and leader of the Masira Pirates. He is a human who looks remarkably like a monkey and is allied with Cricket.

crew.name: Saruyama Alliance
crew.description: An alliance formed to search for the Sky Island and the City of Gold.

name: Shoujou
description: The Sonar King and leader of the Shoujou Pirates. Like his brother Masira, he resembles a monkey and uses his voice as a sonar.

crew.name: Saruyama Alliance
crew.description: An alliance formed to search for the Sky Island and the City of Gold.

name: Foxy
description: The captain of the Foxy Pirates, known as the 'Silver Fox'. He is a master of the Davy Back Fight and uses the Slow-Slow Fruit to cheat.

crew.name: Foxy Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew specializing in Davy Back Fights to steal crewmates from other pirates.

fruit.name: Slow-Slow Fruit
fruit.description: Emits 'Noro Noro' beams that slow down the movement of any object or person for 30 seconds.

name: Porche
description: The idol of the Foxy Pirates and Foxy's loyal subordinate. She fights using batons and shurikens hidden as flowers.

crew.name: Foxy Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew specializing in Davy Back Fights.

name: Hamburg
description: A member of the Foxy Pirates and leader of the Groggy Monsters. He is very fast despite his size and fights as a team.

crew.name: Foxy Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew specializing in Davy Back Fights.

name: Gecko Moria
description: A former Warlord of the Sea and captain of the Thriller Bark Pirates. He steals shadows to create zombie armies.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria, using shadows to animate corpses on their massive island-ship.

fruit.name: Shadow-Shadow Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to manifest and control shadows as physical beings. They can steal shadows to create zombies.

name: Dr. Hogback
description: A genius surgeon and member of the Thriller Bark Pirates. He constructs the bodies for Moria's zombies.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.
